whitecat.core.role.descriptors
Class RoleDescriptor

java.lang.Object
  whitecat.core.role.descriptors.AbstractDescriptor
      whitecat.core.role.descriptors.RoleDescriptor

public class RoleDescriptor
extends AbstractDescriptor

A descriptor for a role instance. A descriptor specified what a role does, including which operation and events are tied to itself, without specifying directly what it does. This is an implementation of role descriptor based on what you can read in the article Injecting roles in Java agents through runtime bytecode manipulation IBM SYSTEMS JOURNAL, VOL 44, NO 1, 2005 . The main difference between this implementation and the one presented in the above article is for a better modularity and adoption of collections instead of arrays.

Author:
Luca Ferrari - cat4hire@users.sourceforge.net

Method Detail

getEventDscriptors

public final java.util.List<EventDescriptor> getEventDscriptors()
This method can be used to set the value of the eventDscriptors field, providing thus read access to the eventDscriptors property. Please note that this method will return only the events associated to this role descriptor, not the role of the operations.

Returns:
the eventDscriptors value.

getOperationDescriptors

public final java.util.List<OperationDescriptor> getOperationDescriptors()
This method can be used to set the value of the operationDescriptors field, providing thus read access to the operationDescriptors property.

Returns:
the operationDescriptors value.

getAllEventDescriptors

public final java.util.List<EventDescriptor> getAllEventDescriptors()
Provides all the event descriptors contained in this role descriptor, that is the descriptors tied to the role itself as well as the event descriptors tied to each single operation.

Returns:
the list of all the event descriptor, with no particular order. Please note that the same event could be included several time in the list, since it could be embedded by either the role or one (or more) operations.

operationDescriptorsCount

public final int operationDescriptorsCount()
How many operation descriptors this role descriptor has.

Returns:
the number of operation descriptors

eventDescriptorsCount

public final int eventDescriptorsCount()
The number of the event descriptors directly tied to this role descriptor.

Returns:
the number of event descriptors tied to this role descriptor.

eventDescriptorsTotalCount

public final int eventDescriptorsTotalCount()
Returns the total number of event descriptors, including those directly tied to the role descriptor and thos tied to each operation.

Returns:
the total count of the event descriptors contained in this role

setEventDscriptors

protected final void setEventDscriptors(java.util.List<EventDescriptor> eventDscriptors)
This method can be used to set the value of the eventDscriptors field, providing thus write access to the eventDscriptors property.

Parameters:
eventDscriptors - the eventDscriptors to set with the specified value.

setOperationDescriptors

protected final void setOperationDescriptors(java.util.List<OperationDescriptor> operationDescriptors)
This method can be used to set the value of the operationDescriptors field, providing thus write access to the operationDescriptors property.

operationDescriptors - the operationDescriptors to set with the specified value.

getInstance

public static final RoleDescriptor getInstance(java.lang.String name,
                                               java.lang.String aim,
                                               java.util.List<OperationDescriptor> operations,
                                               java.util.List<EventDescriptor> events,
                                               java.util.Set<java.lang.String> keywords)
Factory method to create a role descriptor.

Parameters:
name - the name of the role
aim - the aim of the role
operations - the list of operations tied to such role
events - the events directly tied to the role
keywords - the list of keywords for the role
Returns:
the role descriptor.
